snippet: The Minnesota Vikings have reinstated running back Adrian Peterson from injured reserve, clearing the way for him to return Sunday against the Indianapolis Colts....
lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Vikings have reinstated running back Adrian Peterson from injured reserve, clearing the way for him to return Sunday against the Indianapolis Colts.

headline.main: Adrian Peterson Reinstated From Injured Reserve for Vikings
headline.print_headline: Adrian Peterson Reinstated From Injured Reserve for Vikings
